name: Barira
greetingText: I really love your name and smile btw!
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday to you!! Yayyyyyy! Many many happy returns of the day. You're the best..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: Happy birthday to the most amazing and beautiful soul I'm lucky to call my best friend! May you always smile like this in the many more years to come and grown and prosper <3
outroText: Okay, now smile.. say 'CHEESE'. YAASS.. you gooo girl.. keep that smile smiling coz thats the most beautiful thing about you <3.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. Also come back I'm waiting for you in the chat.
